alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:53PM CDT until May 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Northeastern Madison County in north central Alabama... Southeastern Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Fayetteville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Huntland, Lincoln, Plevna, Elora, Belleview, Larkin, Skinem, Francisco and Beans Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
